contents.name: Row
contents.description: Row 1 is left front, 2 left rear, 3 right front, 4 right rear

contents.name: WheelCount
contents.description: Number of wheels on the axle

contents.name: WheelDiameter
contents.description: Diameter of wheels (without tires), in inches, as per ETRO / TRA standard

contents.name: TireDiameter
contents.description: Diameter of tires, in inches, as per ETRO / TRA standard

contents.name: TireWidth
contents.description: Width of tires, in inches, as per ETRO / TRA standard
